description: Buttons trigger actions. Use primary for main CTA, secondary for less important actions.

size.usage: Default is 32px (2 rows). Use small for dense UIs, large for prominent CTAs.

variant.usage: Primary for main actions. Secondary for less important. Outline for subtle. Ghost for toolbar. Danger for destructive. Link for inline.

icon.usage: Square icon-only buttons. Always add aria-label for accessibility.

radius.usage: Override border radius. Use radius-full for pill-shaped buttons.

block.usage: Full width button. Use for mobile or form submit.

loading.usage: Shows spinner animation. Button becomes non-interactive.

sections.title: Variants
sections.description: Button styles for different purposes and emphasis levels.

sections.title: Sizes
sections.description: Small for dense UIs, default for most cases, large for prominent CTAs.

sections.title: Radius
sections.description: Override border radius. Use radius-full for pill-shaped buttons.

sections.title: Block
sections.description: Full width button for mobile or form submit.

sections.title: Loading
sections.description: Shows spinner animation. Button becomes non-interactive.

sections.title: Icon Button
sections.description: Square icon-only buttons. Use with SVG icons from Lucide or similar sets.

items.html: <svg class="ui-icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"/><path d="m21 21-4.3-4.3"/></svg>

examples.code:
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--sm">
  <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- x icon --></svg>
</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon">
  <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- plus icon --></svg>
</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--lg">
  <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- search icon --></svg>
</button>

sections.title: With Icon
sections.description: Buttons with icon and text. Use ui-button__icon element with --start or --end modifier.

Next <svg class="ui-icon ui-button__icon ui-button__icon--end" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="m9 18 6-6-6-6"/></svg>

examples.code:
<button class="ui-button">
  <svg class="ui-icon ui-button__icon ui-button__icon--start"><!-- plus --></svg>
  Add Item
</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--secondary">
  Next
  <svg class="ui-icon ui-button__icon ui-button__icon--end"><!-- chevron-right --></svg>
</button>
